altername_name: Bomber Man Max: Yami no Senshi
name: Bomberman Max: Red Challenger
overview: A relentless dark warrior, whose background is a mystery, is more rational than Bomberman. However, he appears to hold a special hatred for the mysterious organization seeking to mechanize all life. Max's trademark weapon is an electrically charged bomb, which he uses skillfully. Create and customize Charabombs by combining yours with a friend's. Receive new areas that only exist in Bomberman Max Blue Champion! Four modes of play with 80 areas!
